featured.text: The style of the dances varies from region to region but is normally based on the rhythms of taiko drums.

definition.zh_def: 太鼓，一種日本傳統的打擊樂器，通常由木製框架和動物皮製成的鼓面組成。
definition.en_def: Taiko is a traditional Japanese percussion instrument made from a wooden frame and animal skin drumhead.
definition.example: The festival featured a spectacular taiko performance that captivated the audience.
